name: Blue Submarine No. 6: Saigetsu Fumahito - Time and Tide
name_original: Blue Submarine No. 6: Saigetsu Fumahito - Time and Tide
description: Blue Submarine No. 6: Saigetsu Fumahito- Time and Tide (青の６号　歳月不待人 -TIME AND TIDE) is a Adventure video game published by SEGA released on December 7th, 2000 for the SEGA Dreamcast.
